Uses of GuiException in suncertify.gui
 

Methods in suncertify.gui with parameters of type GuiException
 void CommonGui.showMessageDialog(javax.swing.JFrame frame, GuiException e)
          This method creates a message dialog to be displayed in the frame passed as argument and with the title, message and message type extracted from the GuiException object.
 

Methods in suncertify.gui that throw GuiException
 void Controller.bookRecord(Record record)
          This method performs the booking operation in the database.
 RecordTableModel Controller.getAllRecords()
          Retrieves the RecordTableModel with all records from the database.
 void Controller.returnRecord(Record record)
          This method performs the returning operation in the database.
 RecordTableModel Controller.search(java.lang.String[] criteria)
          Returns the RecordTableModel containing all records that met the search criteria.
 

Constructors in suncertify.gui that throw GuiException
Controller(ConfigOptions options)
          Creates an instance of the Controller class using the options configured by the user, that are used in the process of establishing a database connection.

Methods in suncertify.network that throw GuiException
 void ServerStarter.start(javax.swing.JLabel statusLabel)
          This method starts the server that accepts RMI connections and updates the statusLabel during its process.
